## isArray() function

Returns true if object is array, otherwise false

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isArray<T extends Array<any>>(object: any): object is T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  object | any |  |

**Returns:**

object is T
